name: Stefanos Sizzling Pizza Pie
description: Steffano needs your help! Someone broke the door to his kitchen and now bugs can smell his wonderful pizza! Protect Stefanos from the bugs while he creates his amazing pizza pies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
